quote: And to Sarah he said: “Here I give 1,000 pieces of silver to your brother. It is a sign of your innocence to all who are with you and before everybody, and you are cleared of reproach.”
In this army were 700 chosen men who were left-handed. Every one of these men could sling a stone to within a hairbreadth and would not miss.
They went out at noon while Ben-haʹdad was drinking himself drunk in the tents along with the 32 kings who were helping him.
